org.dom4j.io
Class DOMWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.dom4j.io.DOMWriter
public class DOMWriter
extends Object

DOMWriter takes a DOM4J tree and outputs it as a W3C DOM object

Version:
$Revision: 1.17 $
Author:
James Strachan
